level.heading: Maintenance of documents.
level.text: Copies of the specimen bonds and of the final Financing Documents and Closing Documents shall be filed in the Office of the Secretary of the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2172(c) of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-33, see notes following ยง 42-2812.01.
